alert.note: Alert for Chatham; Durham; Lee (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 12:06PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Lee, southwestern Wake, Chatham and southwestern Durham Counties through 1245 PM EDT... At 1205 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pittsboro, moving northeast at 20 mph. Additional storms are developing quickly across southern and eastern Chatham county into western Wake county, including Jordan Lake. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Durham, Cary, Pittsboro, Goldston, Apex, Holly Springs, Jordan Lake, Crosswinds Boating Center, Crosswinds Campground, New Hill and Harpers Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Boaters on Jordan Lake should head to shore immediately and go to a safe shelter.
